title: Unavailable in my country.
body:
When I try to download the app it says its unavailable in my country (Belgium)
Then I read somewhere that it's only available in NA & OCE but for some my friends (from EU) were able to download it no problem.

Kind of confused.

replies.body: I got the same problem, I'm from Denmark.

It's out now though! Let me know if it works for you! 

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/download-free-league-friends-mobile-app

Hi! Sorry about the confusion friends. :( 

We'll be releasing in Europe in the next few weeks. Anyone who has the app in Europe may have downloaded the apk from a 3rd party site (which is risky - could be packaged with viruses, keyloggers, etc.). I will ping on this topic as soon as we have our official app store/play store releases with the link to download. Thanks for your patience.
